mapper.select:
select count(*) from KXXYJ_SJGZ t Left join lxsh_sjgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm where 1=1 and (t.sbthcd <=7 or t.sbthcd is null)
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t1.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and t.jsjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
and t1.lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'

select count(*) from KXXYJ_LMGZ t Left join lxsh_lmgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm where 1=1 and (t.sbthcd <=7 or t.sbthcd is null)
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t1.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and t.jsjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
and t1.lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'

select count(*) from KXXYJ_XJ t Left join lxsh_xj t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm where 1=1 and (t.sbthcd <=7 or t.sbthcd is null)
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t1.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and t.jsjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_SJGZ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_LMGZ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_XJ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_SJGZ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_LMGZ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_XJ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from KXXYJ_SJGZ t Left join lxsh_sjgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm where 1=1 and t.sbthcd=7
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t.shzt like '%'||#{sbzt1}||'%'
and t1.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and t.jsjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'

select count(*) from KXXYJ_LMGZ t Left join lxsh_lmgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm where 1=1 and t.sbthcd=7
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t.shzt like '%'||#{sbzt1}||'%'
and t1.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'
and t.jsjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'

select count(*) from KXXYJ_XJ t Left join lxsh_xj t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm where 1=1 and t.sbthcd=7
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t.shzt like '%'||#{sbzt1}||'%'
and t1.tsdq like '%'||#{tsdq}||'%'

mapper.update: update KXXYJ_SJGZ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_LMGZ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_XJ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from cbsj_sjgz where ${value} and sfbj=1
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_SJGZ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select * from cbsj_lmgz where ${value} and sfbj=1
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_LMGZ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select * from cbsj_xj where ${value} and sfbj=1
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_XJ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select t.*,bzcs bzys,xmid xmbm,lxbm ghlxbh from lxsh_lx t where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.insert: insert into lxsh_lx (xmid, lxbm, lxmc, xzqh, xzqhdm, gydw, gydwdm, qdzh, zdzh, jsjsdj, lc, xjsdj, jsxz, qdmc, zdmc, bzcs, sffirst, jdbs,gpsqdzh,gpszdzh,jsfa,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh,xjlc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc ,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc) select xmid, lxbm, lxmc, xzqh, xzqhdm, gydw, gydwdm, qdzh, zdzh, jsjsdj, lc, xjsdj, jsxz, qdmc, zdmc, bzcs, sffirst, to_char(to_number(#{jdbs})),gpsqdzh,gpszdzh,jsfa,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh,xjlc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc ,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc from lxsh_lx where xmid = #{xmbm} and jdbs=to_char(to_number(#{jdbs})-1)
mapper.update: update kxxyj_sjgz set xmmc=#{1},qdzh=#{3},zdzh=#{4},jsxz=#{5},dq=#{7}, dq_m=#{6},jsjsdj=#{8},sd=#{10},sd_m=#{9},jsdw=#{11},sbthcd=7,tbbmbm='36', kgny=#{12},wgny=#{13},bzdw=#{14},tzgs=#{15},gkpfwh=#{16},pfsj=#{17},xzqh=#{2},xzqhdm=(select id from xtgl_xzqh where trim(name)=#{2}) where xmbm=#{0}
update lxsh_lx set qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{3},xzqh=#{2},lc=#{lc},jsjsdj=#{8},xzqhdm=(select id from xtgl_xzqh where trim(name)=#{2}) where xmid=#{0} and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1'

update kxxyj_lmgz set xmmc=#{1},qdzh=#{3},zdzh=#{4},jsxz=#{5},dq=#{7}, dq_m=#{6},jsjsdj=#{8},sd=#{10},sd_m=#{9},jsdw=#{11},sbthcd=7,tbbmbm='36', kgny=#{12},wgny=#{13},bzdw=#{14},tzgs=#{15},gkpfwh=#{16},pfsj=#{17},xzqh=#{2},xzqhdm=(select id from xtgl_xzqh where trim(name)=#{2}) where xmbm=#{0}

update kxxyj_xj set xmmc=#{1},qdzh=#{3},zdzh=#{4},jsxz=#{5},dq=#{7}, dq_m=#{6},jsjsdj=#{8},sd=#{10},sd_m=#{9},jsdw=#{11},sbthcd=7,tbbmbm='36', kgny=#{12},wgny=#{13},bzdw=#{14},tzgs=#{15},gkpfwh=#{16},pfsj=#{17},xzqh=#{2},xzqhdm=(select id from xtgl_xzqh where trim(name)=#{2}) where xmbm=#{0}
